content: इतिहासः [<ab>fr.</ab> इति-ह-आस(3rd. <ab>pers.</ab> <ab>sing.</ab> Perf. of अस् to be); so it has been] {@--1@} History (legendary or traditional); धर्मार्थकाममोक्षाणामुपदेशसमन्वितं . पूर्ववृत्तं कपायुक्तमितिहासं प्रचक्षते .. {@--2@} Heroic history (such as the Mahābhārata). {@--3@} Historical evidence, tradition (which is recognized as a proof by the Paurāṇikas).
